Captain.Title: Locutus
Captain.Ability: At the start of the game, place 9 Drone Tokens on this card. ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-3 and spend up to 2 of your Drone Tokens. Disable 1 Active Shield on the target ship for each Drone Token you spent with this Action. You cannot deploy this card to the same ship or fleet as "Jean-Luc Picard."

Captain.Title: Vidiian Commander
Captain.Ability: You may add +1 attack die when you initiate an attack with the Grappler or Hypothermic Charge [WEAPON] Upgrades or when performing the Action listed on the Vidiian Boarding Party [CREW] Upgrade.
